price: 32. Mpe bomoyi ya nsé ezali sé liseki mpe lisano, kasi ndako ya lobi nde ezali malamu тропа babangi. Boye bokososola te?
arabic: وَمَا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَآ إِلَّا لَعِبٞ وَلَهۡوٞۖ وَلَلدَّارُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرٞ لِّلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā illā laʿibun walahwun walalddāru al-ākhiratu khayrun lilladhīna yattaqūna afalā taʿqilūna
